title: Synthesis of urea from CO2 and N2 fixation under mild conditions using polarized hydroxyapatite as a catalyst
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE01704D, Paper
Jordi Sans, Marc Arnau, Ricard Bosque, Pau Turon, Carlos Alem√°n
A modified green ceramic converts N2 and CO2 to urea using mild reaction conditions and UV irradiation. The addition of a small amount of NO to the feed gas mixture allows the UV illumination to be removed and enhances the yield and selectivity.
